Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring signage about the risks of sugars and other carbohydrates for people with diabetes and prediabetes
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring signage about the risks of sugars and other carbohydrates for people with diabetes and prediabetes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the results of inspections of food service establishments operated in schools
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DHMH to report on the results of inspections of food service establishments operated in or by schools.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring mobile food vendors to post letter grades received for sanitary inspections
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring mobile food vendors to post letter grades received for sanitary inspections.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reforming the city’s restaurant inspection program.
